body_html:
As far as I can see, the only place where this is actually used is the spectrogram op.

There currently isn't a build switch to turn this off, although it would be fairly straightforward to do.

There currently isn't a build switch to turn this off, although it would be fairly straightforward to do.
body:
As far as I can see, the only place where this is actually used is the [spectrogram op](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/spectrogram.cc). 

There currently isn't a build switch to turn this off, although it would be fairly straightforward to do.
